actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide assistance to certain States bordering the Mississippi River in the construction of the Great River Road.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations of $2,000,000 annually for fiscal years 1975-1977 to be apportioned among the States bordering the Mississippi River for the purpose of constructing the Great River Road.

titles.title: A bill to provide assistance to certain States bordering the Mississippi River in the construction of the Great River Road.
